alert.note: Alert for Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 10:58AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SHACKELFORD AND THROCKMORTON COUNTIES THROUGH NOON CST... At 1058 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Albany, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Throckmorton, Woodson, Elbert, Fort Griffin, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283, Lusk, The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209, and Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
